name: System Collapse
description:
I am way too tired for a detailed explanation

It is your first day on the job at a nuclear power plant. You have a badly written manual and a terminal. Find the commands you need by hovering over words in the manual.

The manual can be dragged with the mouse

Red words are actions, green words are systems. Every command is "action system".

I'll start you off, when it says that the reactor's cooling is off, type "activate cooling"

Win by evacuating everyone, I have not done this - didnt feel up to putting it in the manual. "evacuate workers" and "evacuate staff" are the commands you need

I have hardly play tested this game. It is very hard tho
